name: Dance Paradise
description: "EVERYBODY CAN DANCE SO GET THE PARTY STARTED! - Dance to 40 international hit songs and their original video clips from the worlds’ best-selling music artists! - Watch your very own Xbox Avatar performing your moves! - Multiplayer mode: Dance together in Synchro mode or challenge a friend in Versus and Attack mode. - Need a break? Watch your favorite music videos from the Video Box. Offering fun and challenges, DANCE PARADISE is great fun for everybody ready to burn up the dance floor!"
